name: Floresia I: Intemporel
description:
After losing his wife, Neyn sees appearing in a dream
the spirit of Nayah asking him to resurrect her by realizing the mysterious quest of Floresia.

Features :

- Drama-type story & sad game.

- An Action/Platform/RPG mix with hit and run action fights.

- Between 1 hour and 3 hours to finish the game.

- An original platform system.
